1.title: Filmmaker Audience Q+A: Space & Time

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

1.plot: "Space and Time" director Shawn Gerrard, actress Risa Stone, and producer Cameron MacLaren answer audience questions.

2.title: Filmmaker Audience Q+A: The Great Unwashed

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

2.plot: British filmmaker dynamic duo Izzy and Louis Fonseca discuss their American screen debut.

3.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Wild Honey Director Francis Stokes

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

3.plot: A phone sex operator falls for a client in Francis Stokes' 2017 film festival screening. And, an Adam Rifkin shout out.

4.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Space & Time Actress Risa Stone

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

4.plot: Actress Risa Stone speaks about her comical role and how she is planning a move behind the camera.

5.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Space & Time Director Shawn Gerrard

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

5.plot: Filmmaker Shawn Gerrard's 2017 festival screening is a dose of reality for many turning the big 3-0.

6.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Beauty Mark Director Harris Doran

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

6.plot: Actor turned filmmaker Harris Doran directs a brave film about sexual abuse's lifelong effect on young women.

7.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Beauty Mark Actress Auden Thornton

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

7.plot: Classically trained actress Auden Thornton takes on a challenging role of an abuse victim in "Beauty Mark."

8.title: Red Carpet Q+A: Izzy & Louis Fonseca of The Great Unwashed

episode of.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (TV Mini-Series 2018)

8.plot: The filmmakers have made it across the pond for their first feature film together. Some laughs went down in the theater and during the interview.

imdb.plot outline: The Austin Film Festival is an exciting event that will inspire anyone to enter a screenplay or film into the contest. Future Oscar winners and current nominees and winners attend yearly for workshops and screenings. Dream big and follow the Austin Film Festival's advice: "You can't win if you don't enter."
imdb.title: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival
akas: Breakout Stars of the 2017 Austin Film Festival (United States)
plot: The Austin Film Festival is an exciting event that will inspire anyone to enter a screenplay or film into the contest. Future Oscar winners and current nominees and winners attend yearly for workshops and screenings. Dream big and follow the Austin Film Festival's advice: "You can't win if you don't enter."::Lucky Pineapple Films
